>>Weather Lipetsk

The climatic conditions in Lipetsk are mostly characterized by a frigid and moderate climate. The precipitation levels in the city of Lipetsk are noteworthy, as there is a considerable amount of rainfall even during months that typically experience dry weather. According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing climate in this region is categorized as Dfb. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Lipetsk is 7.1 °C | 44.7 °F, as per the available data. Approximately 622 mm | 24.5 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

Lipetsk is in the northern hemisphere. Its north to the equator line The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The months that constitute this season are referred to as June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Lipetsk

In February, the precipitation level plummets to a mere 43 mm | 1.7 inch. This month holds the title for being exceptionally arid. On average, the highest amount of rainfall occurs during July with a mean value of 63 mm | 2.5 inch.

average temperature by month Lipetsk

The month of highest temperature is July during which the average temperature reaches up to 21.5 °C | 70.7 °F. On average, the month of January is considered to be the coldest time of year with temperatures averaging at around -7.2 °C | 19.0 °F.

The month that sees the most relative humidity is January (60.04 %). The month with the lowest amount of relative humidity is May (60.04 %). The month with the highest amount of rainfall is January (11.10 days), whereas the one with the lowest precipitation level is August (7.97).

Hours of sunshine in Lipetsk

Total hours of sun

In the region of Lipetsk, it has been observed that July is the month which experiences maximum daily sunshine hours, with an average duration of approximately 12.76. The total number of sunlit hours during this period amounts to a staggering sum of about 395.45.

The location of Lipetsk experiences the least amount of daily sunshine hours during January, with an average duration of only 1.44. The total number of sunlight hours recorded in this month is equal to 44.78.

It has been estimated that the total annual sunshine duration in Lipetsk is approximately 2520.32 hours. This translates to an average monthly value of roughly 82.56 hours for each month, on a consistent basis.
